title: Impossible to make friends on League
body:
As a 30 year old player

League is the only game I've ever found that is impossible to make friends on. [EDITED - ULANOPO]

replies.body:
As the OP has made it clear they aren't interested in genuine responses, the thread has been locked and the original post edited.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
 
~ Ulanopo

I'm not sure we should be condoning the insulting generalization of an entire generation of people.

I'm slightly older than you. I've know shitty people of my parents generation (they're damn old), shitty people of my sisters' generation (Gen X), shitty people of my own generation, shitty millennials, and shitty gen Z-ers.

Entitlement comes in all shapes, sizes, and ages.

I hear you :/. Its def hard, but I don't think its on purpose. Depending on what que you're in it could simply be that people are concentrating hard, and typing while playing league is pretty difficult. I took out the Riot tag in my name cause I felt bad about not being able to talk with friendly players mostly cause i was top lane in ranked, and frankly im bad enough at the game that it requires my full attention to play. Sorry it feels this way tho, hopefully there are other avenues that help! I've really enjoyed meeting friends of friends in game. Voice chat helps to meet new ppl :D.
